name: Smashburger Tacos
description: Get ready for a smashin’ good mealtime that combines two all-time faves! Smashburger tacos hit social media by storm to become a viral sensation and we can see why—they’re as delicious as they are fun. Epicure’s Big Burger Sauce adds satisfying sauciness, but you can dress ‘em up with your favourite burger or taco night toppings, like prepared Aiolis, Guacamole, or Poco Picante Salsa.
preparation: In a large bowl, combine ground beef and seasoning. Form into eight balls.

Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Working in batches, arrange three ground beef balls in pan. Top each ball with one tortilla and use a spatula to flatten them. Cook 2–3 min, or until tortilla is warm to touch on top. Flip tacos and cook 1–2 min, or until the bottoms of the burgers begin to brown.
Repeat with remaining ground beef balls until all tacos are cooked.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sauce mix, ketchup, and relish.
Top tacos with prepared sauce and additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Swap ground chicken or turkey for beef if you want a leaner protein option.
If your smashburger tacos are a little on the greasy side, rest them on a paper towel after taking them out of the pan.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Big Burger Sauce Mix
summary: The tastiest burger sauce on this side of the golden arches. Best of all, it’s free of sodium and preservatives. Simply mix the seasoning with mayo, ketchup, and relish, and you’ve got saucy goodness to slather on burgers, sandwiches, sausages, and hot dogs.
